#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
  int a[10010],n,q,count[110],ans,x,y;
  for(int i=0;i<110;i++)count[i]=0;
  scanf("%d%d",&n,&q);
  for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)scanf("%d",&a[i]);
  while(q--)
  {
    ans=0;
    scanf("%d%d",&x,&y);
   for(int i=x;i<=y;i++)count[a[i]]++;
   for(int i=1;i<=100;i++)
   if(count[i]){ans++;count[i]=0;}
   printf("%d\n",ans);
  }
 return 0;
}
